title: Our Client Stories- You are in a Better Place!
description: Learn how brands from all over the world collaborated with Primathon to strengthen their relationships and grow their businesses.

data.name: Udit Sawhney
data.title: CEO- Edfora
data.comment: One of the primary reasons we chose Primathon was their vast knowledge and expertise in understanding and easily resolving technological challenges in our business.

data.name: Tom Welbury
data.title: CPO- Bloom Hotels
data.comment: In the last four months, we've seen our concept come to life. Primathon has a strong work ethic. You delivered what you promised.

data.name: Domnic Francis
data.title: Director/Head of Onboarding- Freshworks
data.comment: It was a pleasure to work with such a dependable team. We made the right decision in confiding in you. You clearly understand our client's needs, and your work speaks volumes about this.

data.name: Ashita Aggarwal
data.title: CEO- Stockal
data.comment: The work you deliver is commendable. Primathon has wowed the entire team!

data.name: Vikas Kapoor
data.title: Chairman & CEO at Mezocliq
data.comment: Primathon's extensive knowledge swiftly tackles our tech challenges, making them the go-to for seamless solutions in our business.

data.name: Michael Dotsikas
data.title: Co-founder - Crypterns
data.comment: Choosing Primathon was a game-changer; their profound tech insights and expert solutions effortlessly resolve challenges, elevating our business efficiency

data.name: Ray Youssef
data.title: CEO- Paxful
data.comment: Our decision to partner with Primathon stems from their exceptional proficiency in deciphering and resolving intricate technological challenges, enhancing our operational resilience.

data.name: Simon Munch-Andersen
data.title: CTO- Ultimate AI
data.comment: Primathon's unmatched expertise effortlessly overcomes our business tech hurdles, showcasing their invaluable understanding and effective solutions for sustained success
